translation: For I alone am the enjoyer and Lord of all sacrifices; but they do not know Me in reality, and thus they return to this mortal world.
commentary: 9.24 I I? Hi verily? of all sacrifices? Enjoyer enjoyer? f and? Lord: Lord? Eve alone? f and? Not not? You but? Maam Me? recognize know? Tattvena in essence (or in reality)? So hence? Chyavanti fall? They they.Commentary They don't know that I? the Supreme Self? am the enjoyer of all sacrifices enjoined in the Vedas and the Smritis (the codes of right conduct).
